tethys.DataReader.GCAMOutputs¶

Import and process sector data from GCAM source database.

@author: Chris R. Vernon (chris.vernon@pnnl.gov), Xinya Li (xinya.li@pnl.gov)

License: BSD 2-Clause, see LICENSE and DISCLAIMER files Copyright (c) 2017, Battelle Memorial Institute

Functions

dom_water_demand_to_array

Query GCAM database for domestic water demand (billion m3).

elec_water_demand_to_array

Query GCAM database for industrial electricity water demand (billion m3).

get_basin_info

Get a dictionary of {region_name: region_id, …}

get_buffalo_frac

Create a dictionary of buffalo fraction per region id.

get_gcam_data

Import and format GCAM data from database for use in Tethys.

get_gcam_queries

Return available queries from GCAM database.

get_goat_frac

Create a dictionary of goat fraction per region id.

get_region_info

Get a dictionary of {region_name: region_id, …}

irr_water_demand_to_array

Query GCAM database for irrigated water demand (billion m3).

land_to_array

Query GCAM database for irrigated land area per region, subregion, and crop type.

livestock_water_demand_to_array

Query GCAM database for livestock water demand (billion m3).

manuf_water_demand_to_array

Query GCAM database for industrical manufacturing water demand (billion m3).

mining_water_demand_to_array

Query GCAM database for industrical manufacturing water demand (billion m3).

population_to_array

Query GCAM database for population.
